mapper.select: select a.no,a.stock_code,b.stock_name,b.stock_type,c.stock_close,b.value, c.valuediffrate from likecompany a, hn_stock_code b ,(select * from (select * from hn_stock_close order by close_date desc)where rownum <=300)c where no=#{no} and a.stock_code=c.stock_code and a.stock_code=b.stock_code
mapper.delete: delete from follow where me=#{me} and likeman=#{likeman}
mapper.select: select nickname, count(nickname) count from (select p.me,p.no,p.percent,p.stock_type,p.regdate,w.nickname from portfolio p, hn_waggle w where p.no=w.no and me=#{me} and to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{regdate}) group by nickname
select p.percent,p.stock_type,p.regdate,w.nickname from portfolio p, hn_waggle w where p.no=w.no and me=#{me} and to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{regdate}
select p.percent,p.stock_type,p.regdate,w.nickname from portfolio p, hn_waggle w where p.no=w.no and me=#{me} and to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{regdate} and nickname=#{nickname}

select * from(select a.stock_code,a.stock_close,a.stock_name,valuediffrate from (select * from(select * from hn_stock_close order by close_date desc) where rownum <=300 )a, (select * from hn_stock_code where stock_type=#{stock_type})b where a.stock_code =b.stock_code order by valuediffrate)where rownum <=3
mapper.update: update hn_waggle set hit = hit+1 where no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from likecompany where no=#{no} and stock_code=#{stock_code}
mapper.select: select * from likecompany where no=#{no} and stock_code=#{stock_code}
select stock_close from (select * from hn_stock_close where stock_name=#{stock_name} order by stock_close desc) where rownum =1
select * from (select likeman, count(likeman) count from follow group by likeman order by count desc) where rownum <=3

select rate, stockvalue,nickname,hart,rank from (select rate, stockvalue,no,nickname,hart, rank() over(order by rate desc) rank from(select a.rate ,a.stockvalue,b.no, b.nickname, b.hart from hn_waggle b , (select * from (SELECT acc_num,rate, stockvalue, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY acc_num ORDER BY no DESC) AS RANK FROM acc_daily) where rank=1) a where b.member_account = a.acc_num) order by rank) rank , (select me from follow where likeman=#{likeman}) jj where rank.nickname=jj.me order by rank
